participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and introspective, often reflecting on personal experiences
participant_1.background: i am a recovering alcoholic. i take many medications and some of them make me see things. i am a 45 year old male. i now live in the city. i grew up on a farm.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: empathetic and supportive, always ready to lend an ear to those in need
participant_2.background: i spent a decade working in the human services field. my father used to work for home depot. i've a son who is in junior high school. horror movies are my favorites.
